trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged" /> 事件時，提供限定資訊給回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.ApplicationChanged> event is raised when:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.ApplicationChanged>就會引發事件時：

trans-unit.source: A peer starts an application within a collaboration
trans-unit.target: 對等啟動應用程式中共同作業

trans-unit.source: A peer ends an application within a collaboration
trans-unit.target: 對等結束共同作業中的應用程式

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> object that represents a collaborating peer has a change in its properties, such as the associated Nickname
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>表示共同作業對等物件其屬性，例如相關聯的別名中有變更

trans-unit.source: The scope of the application is changed on that peer contact's computer
trans-unit.target: 在該對等個體連絡人的電腦上變更應用程式的範圍

trans-unit.source: A peer moves to a different IP address on the network
trans-unit.target: 在網路上的對等將移至不同的 IP 位址

trans-unit.source: Every class that uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs> class requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of Unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 會使用每個類別<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs>類別會要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>沒有限制。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> object is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>建構物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> for which the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得引發事件的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance that was updated.
trans-unit.target: 已更新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 除非有指定，否則這個屬性的預設值為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of change to the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 所發生的變更類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType" /> enumeration value that specifies the type of change that was performed on the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType" /> 列舉值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 上所執行的變更類型。

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 除非有指定，否則這個屬性的預設值為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the endpoint for which <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 資訊已變更的端點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> that contains the endpoint for which application information has changed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />，內含應用程式資訊已變更的端點。

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is <see langword="null" /> for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type <see langword="int" />.
trans-unit.target: 除非明確指定，否則參考型別 (Reference Type) 的所有屬性預設值為 <see langword="null" />，型別為 <see langword="int" /> 的屬性則為零 (0)。
